hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: I craft exceptional digital experiences through clean code and innovative solutions

about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I specialize in building scalable applications with focus on user experience and performance.
about.name: Elia Kuzmanova
about.bio: Friendly, helpful, and always up for the next challenge – that's me. I love learning new things and finding creative solutions. New technologies? Bring them on! Complex problems? I see them as exciting puzzles. I thrive in team environments and enjoy helping others reach their goals. Motivation and dedication come naturally to me.

hobbies.title: Hobbies & Interests
hobbies.subtitle: What I love doing in my free time

items.name: Music Production
items.description: Creating beats and experimenting with different genres in my home studio.

items.name: Photography
items.description: Capturing moments and exploring the world through my lens, especially nature and urban landscapes.

items.name: Gaming
items.description: Enjoying strategy games and indie titles. Love analyzing game mechanics and design patterns.

items.name: Fitness
items.description: Staying active with weightlifting and running. A healthy body keeps the mind sharp for coding.

items.name: Reading
items.description: Tech books, sci-fi novels, and design philosophy. Always learning something new.

items.name: Coffee Culture
items.description: Exploring local coffee shops and perfecting my pour-over technique. Great coffee fuels great code.

items.name: Travel
items.description: Exploring new places, cultures, and tech scenes around the world. Travel broadens perspective.

items.name: Design
items.description: UI/UX design, digital art, and creative projects. Love bringing ideas to life visually.

items.name: Side Projects
items.description: Building personal projects, contributing to open source, and experimenting with new tech stacks.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects I contributed to as part of development teams
projects.note: Note: This is a selection of public projects. Additional projects are currently under NDA or in development.

project7.title: Multi-Tenant Sanitätshaus Platform
project7.description: Scalable multi-tenant platform for medical supply companies. Each of the 14 planned tenants features individual branding and configuration while sharing core infrastructure. Built with Next.js 15, Algolia search, Directus CMS, and Matomo tracking.
project7.contribution: As part of the development team: Multi-tenant architecture & setup, CMS setup & content management, Algolia search integration, Matomo tracking, feature development, bug fixes, documentation, Nginx configuration
project7.tech: Next.js 15, Multi-Tenant Architecture, Algolia, Directus CMS, Matomo, Nginx, TypeScript, Zeptomail, ESLint, Prettier

project1.title: BASF Virtual Car
project1.description: Comprehensive interactive 3D car configurator platform allowing users to explore materials and components. Migration from Vue 2 to Vue 3, Strapi CMS integration, automated backup and language synchronization scripts. NGINX proxy server for routing between different applications (Virtual Car, Offline version, Battery Visualizer).
project1.contribution: As part of the development team: Vue 2 to Vue 3 migration, Strapi CMS setup & integration, Express-based automation scripts (backup creation, language synchronization, content extraction for offline version), NGINX proxy server configuration, API connections, PWA implementation
project1.tech: Vue 3, Three.js, Strapi CMS, Node.js, Express, NGINX, Railway, PWA, REST APIs, WebGL, IndexedDB, Service Workers

project2.title: BASF Virtual Car - Offline
project2.description: Offline version of the Virtual Car platform with local data synchronization and PWA capabilities. Automatic content extraction from backups for seamless user experience without internet connection. Integrated into NGINX proxy infrastructure.
project2.contribution: As part of the development team: Offline functionality, data synchronization, PWA implementation, content extraction from backups, Express scripts for automatic content provisioning
project2.tech: Vue 3, PWA, IndexedDB, Service Workers, Express, NGINX, Railway, Sync API

project3.title: UP Design Studio
project3.description: Modern design studio portfolio website showcasing multidisciplinary design work. NGINX proxy server for domain management (www.updesignstudio.de, www.updesignstudio.email, upviz.updesignstudio.de, staging.updesignstudio.de, start.updesignstudio.de). Contentful CMS integration, feature development, and server optimization.
project3.contribution: As part of the development team: NGINX proxy server setup & configuration, domain management, Contentful CMS integration, feature development, bug fixes, performance optimization
project3.tech: Next.js, NGINX, Contentful CMS, Railway, JavaScript

project4.title: SMINA - Online Sanitätshaus
project4.description: Full-featured e-commerce platform for medical aids with over 200 partner locations. Features: prescription upload with Google Document AI, Algolia search, SMINA Box (digital care aid ordering), chatbot, Contentful CMS, Shopify integration, payment processing (Klarna, PayPal) and DHL shipping.
project4.contribution: As part of the development team: Feature development, bug fixes, testing, frontend development, API integrations (Contentful, Shopify, Algolia, Google Document AI), prescription upload implementation, payment integration
project4.tech: Next.js 15, Contentful CMS, Algolia, Shopify, Google Document AI, Material-UI, Tailwind CSS, Railway, Friendly Captcha, Nodemailer, ESLint, Prettier

project5.title: Khimi - Auxilium Gruppe
project5.description: Playful web application that makes medical aids from medical supply stores interesting and accessible for children. Products are presented in a game-like format to help children understand and engage with assistive devices in a positive and appealing way. Desktop-only application with Directus CMS, Zeptomail integration, Friendly Captcha, and Excel export functionality.
project5.contribution: Mainly developed independently (with minor team adjustments): CMS setup, backend development, Nginx configuration, feature implementation
project5.tech: Next.js 16, Directus CMS, Zeptomail, Friendly Captcha, Tailwind CSS 4, Nginx, Railway, ESLint, Prettier

project6.title: Dürr Interactive Showroom
project6.description: Comprehensive interactive showroom platform for industrial solutions with multiple applications (Interactive Paintshop, NAOTF Interactive, Battery Concept Line). Strapi CMS with separate visitor login and app-specific access based on Strapi settings. NGINX proxy server for CMS management, overview portal, authentication server, and routing to multiple interactive applications. Private networking on Railway for secure internal service communication.
project6.contribution: As part of the development team: Strapi CMS setup & configuration, visitor login system with app-specific access, NGINX proxy server configuration (CMS, auth server, multi-app routing), backend development, private networking setup
project6.tech: Strapi CMS, Node.js, NGINX, Railway, Private Networking, Auth Server, Interactive 3D, WebGL

project9.title: NGINX Gateway & Proxy Server
project9.description: Central NGINX gateway with OpenResty and Auth0 integration for multi-tenant infrastructure. Manages over 20 domains (including www.xcarstens.de, www.luttermann-wesel.de, wirliste.xcarstens.de, updesignstudio.auxiliumgruppe.de, khimi.auxiliumgruppe.online, www.auxiliumgruppe.de and more). Implements Private Networking on Railway, Lua-based authentication, security headers, IP whitelisting, and proxy routing to internal services as well as external Framer pages.
project9.contribution: As part of the development team: Gateway setup, NGINX configuration, domain management, security headers, proxy routing
project9.tech: NGINX, OpenResty, Lua, Auth0, Railway, Docker, Private Networking

project10.title: Meyra Power Wheelchairs - Configurator
project10.description: Interactive power wheelchair configurator. Step-by-step configuration process with questions about usage, restrictions, and customizations. Features: Mobile-optimized interface, PDF export of configuration, dealer search, link sharing. Responsive design with tab navigation for desktop and mobile tabs for smartphones.
project10.contribution: As part of the development team: Frontend development, Vue 3 components, configuration logic, PDF export, dealer integration, mobile-responsive design, UI/UX
project10.tech: Vue 3, Tailwind CSS 3.4, jsPDF, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Railway

project11.title: MacDermid Alpha - TrueNorth Selector Guide
project11.description: Interactive material solution guide platform for electronics solutions. Interactive compass navigation for material selection by application areas (Industrial, White Goods, PV, 2 Wheel EV, Auto EV, Auto ICE). Features: Material Solution Positioning, Commercial Considerations, Technical Considerations, Tesseract OCR-based full-text search across all presentation slides and documents.
project11.contribution: As part of the development team: Frontend development, Vue.js components, Tesseract OCR search implementation, OCR service for automatic text extraction from images, feature development, UI/UX
project11.tech: Vue.js, Tesseract.js, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Railway

project8.title: Additional Projects
project8.description: Several additional projects are currently under development or covered by non-disclosure agreements. These include enterprise applications, internal tools, and client-specific solutions.
project8.contribution: As part of various development teams: Contributions across frontend, backend, and infrastructure

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.
